member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Utils.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Utils.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Utils.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Utils.Resources.Error_UnrecognizedCommand
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unrecognized command '{0}'.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Assembly '{0}' could not be loaded because it is a bad image. http://support.microsoft.com/kb/967163.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Creating temp directory {0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Utils.Resources.Notify_Help
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to usage: signalr <command> [args]
Available commands:
{0}
For more information, visit http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=275833.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Utils.Resources.Error_MissingBindingRedirect
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to NOTE: These errors are often caused by missing binding redirects. If your server application has a 'Web.config' or '[AppName].exe.config' file with binding redirects in it, provide the path to that file with the '/configFile:' parameter .
